title: Automation Hub APIs

detailed_design.description: Implement config-driven APIs for cron jobs and automations. Currently /api/cron-jobs and /api/automations return empty lists. Populate from data/cron_jobs.json and data/automations.json.
detailed_design.solution: 1. Add cron_jobs_config_path and automations_config_path to config.py. 2. Create data/cron_jobs.json and data/automations.json with sample schema. 3. Implement _load_cron_jobs() and _load_automations() following _load_agents() pattern. 4. Wire list_cron_jobs and list_automations to load from config.

acceptance_criteria: Schemas match existing CronJobInfo and AutomationInfo in api_schemas.py
API client already calls these endpoints; backend populates them
Empty or missing config files return empty list

user_stories.story: As a user, I want to see my configured cron jobs in the Automation Hub.
As a user, I want to see my configured automations in the Automation Hub.
As a developer, I want cron/automation config in JSON files for easy editing.

technical_notes.current_issue: cron-jobs and automations endpoints return empty stubs
